attributes.action: Officialy recognise the Knights of the Empire Costuming club as the official Stormtrooper charity fundraisers in the United Kingdom.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The knights of the Empire wish to be recognised as the official Imperial Stormtroopers in the United Kingdom thus helping in there fundraising for the Childrens charity NACCPO.

reasons: Commercial endorsement, promotion of any product, service or publication, or statements that amount to adverts
